location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch map of the Omani and Emirati coast from Muscat northbound

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on tracing clothDimensions:482 x 305 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by contours and hachures.Towns under Muscat authority underlined in red ink with distance from Ras Al Hamra inserted and shown in miles. Contains annotations concerning geology on hot springs and volcanic rocks, valleys and rivers labelled and shown by pecked line.
